verbose_text: Our data demonstrated that the neuroprotective effects of Mat may be associated with the suppression of the cell apoptosis through the regulation of the expression of Bax, Bcl-2 and caspase-3 proteins and an increase in the Bcl-2 / Bax ratio, as well as the suppression of oxidative stress, as evidenced by a decrease in the MDA content, and an increase in SOD, GSH-Px and CAT activity and T-AOC in mice subjected to MCAO.
